Plot: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.
Title: Enough Said
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Lennie Loftin, Jessica St. Clair, Christopher Nicholas Smith
tomatoConsensus: Wryly charming, impeccably acted, and ultimately quite bittersweet, Enough Said is a grown-up movie in the best possible way.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 9 wins & 36 nominations.
